channel.title: Spec help!
channel.description: I added a special attack to one on my weapons, its all works fine and all but when i hit a high spec it messes up. EX: I hit 99 with the spec but the damage appears on me and also it does not affect any ones hp.

item.title: Spec help!
item.dc:creator: @statsflamescape statsflamescape
item.description:
@statsflamescape wrote:

I added a special attack to one on my weapons, its all works fine and all but when i hit a high spec it messes up.
EX:
I hit 99 with the spec but the damage appears on me and also it does not affect any ones hp.

Read full topic
